attributes.action: Apologise for the unlawful child migration to Australia from 1947 to 1967 .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recently acquired knowledge that the forced child emigration from Britain to Australia was to progress from 1947 to 1967 requires an apology to those of us that were part of this deception. 
    I claim that we were placed into the laps of the most despicable paedophilic slave driving filth of an organisation that ruled the orphanages of Castledare,Clontarf and that abusive abomination of Bindoon Boys Town in Western Australia . None of us were orphaned...not one! Most of us were to glide past,either in the Suez or upon the high seas,the incoming imigrants from Asia with THEIR children. 492 Jamaicans were to disembark at Tilbury Docks on the 22 June 1948. Mere months following my own expulsion.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action or change in policy rather than a call for a statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
